content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}]
thought: To craft a diamond helmet, I need to place 5 diamonds in a v shape in the crafting grid. I will start by moving the diamond from slot 13 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: diamond_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}]
thought: I will now move the diamond from slot 13 to slot 2 to place it to the right of the diamond in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 3, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}]
thought: I will now move the diamond from slot 13 to slot 3 to place it to the right of the diamond in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 3 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 2, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}]

Ok

inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}]

inventory=[{"type": "diamond_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
